export const styles = {
  // Layout
  appWrap: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    minHeight: '100vh',
    fontFamily: 'Georgia, serif',
    background: '#fafafa',

    display: 'flex',

    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',

    padding: '10px 12px',

    background: 'none',

    fontSize: 14,
    textAlign: 'left',

  },
  sidebarItemActive: {
    background: '#222',

  },
  sidebarStats: {
    display: 'flex',

  statBox: {
    flex: 1,

    background: '#f5f5f5',
    borderRadius: 8,

    display: 'flex',

  },
  // Auth
  authWrap: {
    display: 'flex',

  },
  authCard: {
    background: '#fff',

    padding: '40px 36px',

    maxWidth: 420
  },
  authTitle: {
    fontSize: 28,
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    textAlign: 'center',

  },
  authSubtitle: {
    color: '#777',
    textAlign: 'center',

  infoBox: {

  genderBtn: {

    fontFamily: 'Georgia, serif'

  secondaryBtn: {

  // Pages
  page: {

    maxWidth: 900
  },
  pageTitle: {
    fontSize: 26,
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    marginBottom: 6
  },
  pageSubtitle: {
    color: '#777',
    marginBottom: 28,
    fontSize: 14
  },
  emptyState: {
    textAlign: 'center',
    padding: '60px 20px',
    color: '#aaa'
  },

    color: '#fff',

    textAlign: 'center',
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    fontSize: 16
  },
  // Discover

    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    alignItems: 'center'
  },
  profileCard: {
    background: '#fff',
    border: '2px solid #222',
    borderRadius: 16,
    padding: '36px 32px',
    width: 340,
    textAlign: 'center',

  },
  cardLiked: {
    transform: 'translateX(80px) rotate(10deg)',

  cardPassed: {
    transform: 'translateX(-80px) rotate(-10deg)',
    opacity: 0.3
  },
  profileAvatar: {
    width: 80,
    height: 80,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: '#222',
    color: '#fff',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    fontSize: 36,
    fontWeight: 'bold',

  },
  profileAlias: {

  },
  profileMeta: {
    color: '#888',
    fontSize: 13,
    marginBottom: 8
  },
  profileBio: {
    color: '#666',
    fontSize: 13,
    fontStyle: 'italic',
    marginBottom: 12
  },
  interestRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexWrap: 'wrap',
    gap: 6,

    marginBottom: 20
  },
  interestTag: {
    background: '#f0f0f0',
    border: '1px solid #ddd',
    borderRadius: 20,
    padding: '4px 10px',
    fontSize: 12
  },
  interestTagSm: {
    background: '#f0f0f0',
    borderRadius: 20,
    padding: '3px 8px',
    fontSize: 11
  },
  actionRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: 16,
    justifyContent: 'center'
  },
  passBtn: {
    padding: '10px 28px',
    background: '#fff',
    border: '2px solid #e74c3c',

    padding: '10px 28px',

  cardCounter: {
    marginTop: 16,

  },
  // Matches
  matchGrid: {
    display: 'grid',
    gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(220px, 1fr))',
    gap: 20
  },
  matchCard: {
    background: '#fff',
    border: '1px solid #ddd',

    width: 60,

    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    fontSize: 26,
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    margin: '0 auto 10px'
  },
  matchAlias: {
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    fontSize: 16,
    marginBottom: 4
  },
  matchMeta: {
    color: '#888',
    fontSize: 12,
    marginBottom: 10
  },
  // Chat
  chatLayout: {
    display: 'flex',
    height: 'calc(100vh - 110px)'
  },
  chatList: {
    width: 260,
    background: '#fff',
    borderRight: '1px solid #e0e0e0',
    overflowY: 'auto',
    flexShrink: 0
  },
  chatListTitle: {
    padding: '16px',
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    borderBottom: '1px solid #eee',
    fontSize: 15
  },
  chatListItem: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 10,
    padding: '12px 16px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    borderBottom: '1px solid #f5f5f5',
    position: 'relative'
  },
  chatListItemActive: {
    background: '#f5f5f5'
  },
  chatListAvatar: {
    width: 38,
    height: 38,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: '#222',
    color: '#fff',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    flexShrink: 0
  },
  chatListName: {
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    fontSize: 13
  },
  chatListPreview: {
    color: '#aaa',
    fontSize: 12,
    overflow: 'hidden',
    textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
    whiteSpace: 'nowrap'
  },
  onlineDot: {
    width: 8,
    height: 8,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: '#2ecc71',
    position: 'absolute',
    right: 12,
    top: 12
  },
  chatWindow: {
    flex: 1,
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column'
  },
  chatHeader: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 12,
    padding: '14px 20px',
    borderBottom: '1px solid #eee',

    fontWeight: 'bold',

  },

    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    alignItems: 'flex-start'

  msgBubbleMe: {
    background: '#222',
    color: '#fff',
    borderRadius: '18px 18px 4px 18px',
    padding: '10px 14px',
    maxWidth: 280,
    fontSize: 14
  },
  msgBubbleThem: {
    background: '#fff',
    border: '1px solid #e0e0e0',
    borderRadius: '18px 18px 18px 4px',
    padding: '10px 14px',
    maxWidth: 280,
    fontSize: 14
  },
  msgTime: {
    fontSize: 10,
    color: '#bbb',
    marginTop: 2
  },
  chatInputRow: {

    gap: 8,
    padding: '12px 16px',
    borderTop: '1px solid #eee',
    background: '#fff',
    flexShrink: 0
  },
  chatInput: {
    flex: 1,
    padding: '10px 14px',
    border: '1px solid #ccc',
    borderRadius: 24,
    fontSize: 14,
    outline: 'none',
    fontFamily: 'Georgia, serif'
  },
  sendBtn: {
    padding: '10px 18px',
    background: '#222',
    color: '#fff',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: 24,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    fontFamily: 'Georgia, serif'

  // Profile edit
  profileEditCard: {
    background: '#fff',
    border: '1px solid #ddd',
    borderRadius: 12,
    padding: 32,
    maxWidth: 500

  profileEditAvatar: {
    width: 80,

    fontSize: 12,
    marginBottom: 20

    background: '#fff',

  settingRow: {

    fontWeight: 'bold',
    fontSize: 14,
    marginBottom: 2

    color: '#888',
    fontSize: 12

    width: 44,
    height: 24,
    borderRadius: 12,
    background: '#222',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    position: 'relative',

    flexShrink: 0

  toggleOff: {
    width: 44,
    height: 24,
    borderRadius: 12,
    background: '#ccc',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    position: 'relative',
    transition: 'background 0.2s',
    flexShrink: 0

  toggleKnob: {
    width: 18,
    height: 18,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: '#fff',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 3,
    transition: 'left 0.2s, right 0.2s'
  },

    borderTop: '1px solid #e0e0e0',

    flexWrap: 'wrap',
    gap: 4
  },
  footerLink: {
    color: '#555',
    textDecoration: 'none'
  }
};

sourcesContent:
export const styles = {
  // Layout
  appWrap: { display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', minHeight:'100vh', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif', background:'#fafafa', color:'#222' },
  body: { display:'flex', flex:1 },
  main: { flex:1, overflow:'auto' },
  loadingWrap: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', height:'60vh', fontSize:18, color:'#aaa' },

  // Header
  header: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', padding:'12px 24px', background:'#fff', borderBottom:'2px solid #222', position:'sticky', top:0, zIndex:100 },
  headerLogo: { fontSize:22, fontWeight:'bold', cursor:'pointer', marginRight:'auto' },
  headerNav: { display:'flex', gap:4 },
  navBtn: { background:'none', border:'1px solid transparent', borderRadius:6, padding:'6px 14px', cursor:'pointer', fontSize:14, color:'#444', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  navBtnActive: { background:'#222', color:'#fff', border:'1px solid #222' },
  headerRight: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', gap:12, marginLeft:24 },
  aliasTag: { background:'#f0f0f0', padding:'4px 10px', borderRadius:20, fontSize:13, fontWeight:'bold' },
  logoutBtn: { background:'none', border:'1px solid #ccc', borderRadius:6, padding:'5px 12px', cursor:'pointer', fontSize:13, fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },

  // Sidebar
  sidebar: { width:220, background:'#fff', borderRight:'1px solid #e0e0e0', padding:'20px 12px', display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', gap:4, flexShrink:0 },
  sidebarUser: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', gap:12, padding:'8px 0 16px' },
  sidebarAvatar: { width:44, height:44, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:20, fontWeight:'bold' },
  sidebarAlias: { fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:14 },
  sidebarGender: { color:'#777', fontSize:12 },
  sidebarDivider: { border:'none', borderTop:'1px solid #eee', margin:'8px 0' },
  sidebarItem: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', gap:10, padding:'10px 12px', borderRadius:8, border:'none', background:'none', cursor:'pointer', fontSize:14, textAlign:'left', color:'#444', width:'100%', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  sidebarItemActive: { background:'#222', color:'#fff' },
  sidebarStats: { display:'flex', gap:8, marginTop:8 },
  statBox: { flex:1, textAlign:'center', background:'#f5f5f5', borderRadius:8, padding:'8px 4px', display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', gap:2, fontSize:12 },

  // Auth
  authWrap: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', flex:1, padding:24, minHeight:'80vh' },
  authCard: { background:'#fff', border:'2px solid #222', borderRadius:12, padding:'40px 36px', width:'100%', maxWidth:420 },
  authTitle: { fontSize:28, fontWeight:'bold', textAlign:'center', marginBottom:6 },
  authSubtitle: { color:'#777', textAlign:'center', marginBottom:24, fontSize:14 },
  infoBox: { background:'#e8f5e9', border:'1px solid #a5d6a7', borderRadius:8, padding:'12px 16px', marginBottom:16, fontSize:13, color:'#2e7d32' },
  input: { display:'block', width:'100%', padding:'10px 12px', marginBottom:12, border:'1px solid #ccc', borderRadius:6, fontSize:14, boxSizing:'border-box', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  label: { display:'block', fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:13, marginBottom:6, color:'#444' },
  genderRow: { display:'flex', gap:8, marginBottom:14 },
  genderBtn: { flex:1, padding:'8px 4px', border:'1px solid #ccc', borderRadius:6, background:'#fff', cursor:'pointer', fontSize:13, fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  genderBtnActive: { background:'#222', color:'#fff', border:'1px solid #222' },
  primaryBtn: { display:'block', width:'100%', padding:'11px', background:'#222', color:'#fff', border:'none', borderRadius:6, cursor:'pointer', fontSize:15, fontWeight:'bold', marginTop:8, textAlign:'center', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  secondaryBtn: { display:'block', padding:'9px 16px', background:'#fff', color:'#222', border:'1px solid #222', borderRadius:6, cursor:'pointer', fontSize:14, marginTop:4, fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  authSwitch: { textAlign:'center', marginTop:16, fontSize:13, color:'#555' },
  authLink: { color:'#222', fontWeight:'bold', cursor:'pointer', textDecoration:'underline' },
  error: { color:'#e74c3c', fontSize:13, marginBottom:8 },

  // Pages
  page: { padding:'32px 40px', maxWidth:900 },
  pageTitle: { fontSize:26, fontWeight:'bold', marginBottom:6 },
  pageSubtitle: { color:'#777', marginBottom:28, fontSize:14 },
  emptyState: { textAlign:'center', padding:'60px 20px', color:'#aaa' },
  matchBanner: { background:'#222', color:'#fff', padding:'14px 20px', borderRadius:10, marginBottom:20, textAlign:'center', fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:16 },

  // Discover
  discoverWrap: { display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', alignItems:'center' },
  profileCard: { background:'#fff', border:'2px solid #222', borderRadius:16, padding:'36px 32px', width:340, textAlign:'center', transition:'transform 0.3s, opacity 0.3s' },
  cardLiked: { transform:'translateX(80px) rotate(10deg)', opacity:0.3 },
  cardPassed: { transform:'translateX(-80px) rotate(-10deg)', opacity:0.3 },
  profileAvatar: { width:80, height:80, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:36, fontWeight:'bold', margin:'0 auto 12px' },
  profileAlias: { fontSize:22, fontWeight:'bold', marginBottom:4 },
  profileMeta: { color:'#888', fontSize:13, marginBottom:8 },
  profileBio: { color:'#666', fontSize:13, fontStyle:'italic', marginBottom:12 },
  interestRow: { display:'flex', flexWrap:'wrap', gap:6, justifyContent:'center', marginBottom:20 },
  interestTag: { background:'#f0f0f0', border:'1px solid #ddd', borderRadius:20, padding:'4px 10px', fontSize:12 },
  interestTagSm: { background:'#f0f0f0', borderRadius:20, padding:'3px 8px', fontSize:11 },
  actionRow: { display:'flex', gap:16, justifyContent:'center' },
  passBtn: { padding:'10px 28px', background:'#fff', border:'2px solid #e74c3c', color:'#e74c3c', borderRadius:30, cursor:'pointer', fontSize:15, fontWeight:'bold', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  likeBtn: { padding:'10px 28px', background:'#e74c3c', color:'#fff', border:'none', borderRadius:30, cursor:'pointer', fontSize:15, fontWeight:'bold', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  cardCounter: { marginTop:16, color:'#aaa', fontSize:13 },

  // Matches
  matchGrid: { display:'grid', gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(220px, 1fr))', gap:20 },
  matchCard: { background:'#fff', border:'1px solid #ddd', borderRadius:12, padding:20, textAlign:'center' },
  matchAvatar: { width:60, height:60, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:26, fontWeight:'bold', margin:'0 auto 10px' },
  matchAlias: { fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:16, marginBottom:4 },
  matchMeta: { color:'#888', fontSize:12, marginBottom:10 },

  // Chat
  chatLayout: { display:'flex', height:'calc(100vh - 110px)' },
  chatList: { width:260, background:'#fff', borderRight:'1px solid #e0e0e0', overflowY:'auto', flexShrink:0 },
  chatListTitle: { padding:'16px', fontWeight:'bold', borderBottom:'1px solid #eee', fontSize:15 },
  chatListItem: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', gap:10, padding:'12px 16px', cursor:'pointer', borderBottom:'1px solid #f5f5f5', position:'relative' },
  chatListItemActive: { background:'#f5f5f5' },
  chatListAvatar: { width:38, height:38, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:16, fontWeight:'bold', flexShrink:0 },
  chatListName: { fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:13 },
  chatListPreview: { color:'#aaa', fontSize:12, overflow:'hidden', textOverflow:'ellipsis', whiteSpace:'nowrap' },
  onlineDot: { width:8, height:8, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#2ecc71', position:'absolute', right:12, top:12 },
  chatWindow: { flex:1, display:'flex', flexDirection:'column' },
  chatHeader: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', gap:12, padding:'14px 20px', borderBottom:'1px solid #eee', background:'#fff', flexShrink:0 },
  chatHeaderAvatar: { width:38, height:38, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:16, fontWeight:'bold' },
  chatHeaderName: { fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:15 },
  chatHeaderStatus: { fontSize:12, color:'#888' },
  messagesArea: { flex:1, overflowY:'auto', padding:'20px', display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', gap:8, background:'#fafafa' },
  msgWrapMe: { display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', alignItems:'flex-end' },
  msgWrapThem: { display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', alignItems:'flex-start' },
  msgBubbleMe: { background:'#222', color:'#fff', borderRadius:'18px 18px 4px 18px', padding:'10px 14px', maxWidth:280, fontSize:14 },
  msgBubbleThem: { background:'#fff', border:'1px solid #e0e0e0', borderRadius:'18px 18px 18px 4px', padding:'10px 14px', maxWidth:280, fontSize:14 },
  msgTime: { fontSize:10, color:'#bbb', marginTop:2 },
  chatInputRow: { display:'flex', gap:8, padding:'12px 16px', borderTop:'1px solid #eee', background:'#fff', flexShrink:0 },
  chatInput: { flex:1, padding:'10px 14px', border:'1px solid #ccc', borderRadius:24, fontSize:14, outline:'none', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },
  sendBtn: { padding:'10px 18px', background:'#222', color:'#fff', border:'none', borderRadius:24, cursor:'pointer', fontWeight:'bold', fontFamily:'Georgia, serif' },

  // Profile edit
  profileEditCard: { background:'#fff', border:'1px solid #ddd', borderRadius:12, padding:32, maxWidth:500 },
  profileEditAvatar: { width:80, height:80, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#222', color:'#fff', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', fontSize:36, fontWeight:'bold', marginBottom:12 },
  profileEditAlias: { fontSize:22, fontWeight:'bold', marginBottom:4 },
  profileEditNote: { color:'#aaa', fontSize:12, marginBottom:20 },
  profileSection: { marginBottom:16 },

  // Settings
  settingsCard: { background:'#fff', border:'1px solid #ddd', borderRadius:12, padding:32, maxWidth:480, display:'flex', flexDirection:'column' },
  settingRow: { display:'flex', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'space-between', padding:'14px 0', borderBottom:'1px solid #f0f0f0' },
  settingLabel: { fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:14, marginBottom:2 },
  settingDesc: { color:'#888', fontSize:12 },
  toggleOn: { width:44, height:24, borderRadius:12, background:'#222', cursor:'pointer', position:'relative', transition:'background 0.2s', flexShrink:0 },
  toggleOff: { width:44, height:24, borderRadius:12, background:'#ccc', cursor:'pointer', position:'relative', transition:'background 0.2s', flexShrink:0 },
  toggleKnob: { width:18, height:18, borderRadius:'50%', background:'#fff', position:'absolute', top:3, transition:'left 0.2s, right 0.2s' },

  // Footer
  footer: { background:'#fff', borderTop:'1px solid #e0e0e0', padding:'12px 24px', fontSize:12, color:'#888', display:'flex', alignItems:'center', flexWrap:'wrap', gap:4 },
  footerLink: { color:'#555', textDecoration:'none' },
};
